places.name: D.O.M.
places.address: R. Barão de Capanema, 549 - Jardins, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A fine dining restaurant by acclaimed chef Alex Atala, offering a tasting menu with Amazonian and Brazilian ingredients.

places.name: Maní
places.address: Rua Joaquim Antunes, 210 - Jardim Paulistano, São Paulo - SP
places.description: Led by chef Helena Rizzo, Maní offers contemporary and creative Brazilian cuisine in a charming setting.

places.name: Fasano
places.address: Rua Vitório Fasano, 88 - Cerqueira César, São Paulo - SP
places.description: Located in the Fasano Hotel, it's an icon of classic and sophisticated Italian gastronomy in São Paulo.

places.name: Tordesilhas
places.address: Alameda Tietê, 489 - Jardins, São Paulo - SP
places.description: Dedicated to traditional Brazilian cuisine, it's known for its cozy atmosphere and authentic dishes from various regions of Brazil.

places.name: Shopping Morumbi
places.address: Av. Roque Petroni Júnior, 1089 - Jardim das Acácias, São Paulo - SP
places.description: One of the largest and most complete shopping malls, with a wide variety of stores, restaurants, and entertainment.

places.name: Shopping JK Iguatemi
places.address: Av. Pres. Juscelino Kubitschek, 2041 - Vila Olímpia, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A luxury shopping mall that hosts some of the world's most prestigious brands, with excellent restaurants and cinemas.

places.name: Shopping Cidade Jardim
places.address: Av. Magalhães de Castro, 12000 - Cidade Jardim, São Paulo - SP
places.description: Known for its open-air concept and beautiful gardens, it offers a luxury shopping experience with designer stores.

places.name: Higienópolis
places.address: Av. Higienópolis, 618 - Higienópolis, São Paulo - SP
places.description: Known for its architecture with a large glass dome. It offers a mix of shops, a cinema, a theater and more.

places.name: Shopping Eldorado
places.address: Av. Rebouças, 3970 - Pinheiros, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A traditional and popular mall with a wide range of stores for all budgets, a large food court, and cinemas.

places.name: Ibirapuera Park
places.address: Av. Pedro Álvares Cabral - Vila Mariana, São Paulo - SP
places.description: The most famous urban park in São Paulo. It hosts museums, auditoriums, exhibition spaces, lakes, and sports areas.

places.name: Villa-Lobos Park
places.address: Av. Prof. Fonseca Rodrigues, 2001 - Alto de Pinheiros, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A large park with vast green areas, bike paths, sports courts, and spaces for concerts. Ideal for outdoor activities.

places.name: Independence Park
places.address: Av. Nazaré, s/n - Ipiranga, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A historic park where the Ipiranga Museum is located. It features beautiful French-style gardens and monuments.

places.name: São Paulo Botanical Garden
places.address: Av. Miguel Estefno, 3031 - Vila Água Funda, São Paulo - SP
places.description: An oasis of tranquility with a great diversity of native Brazilian plants and trees. Ideal for walking and observing nature.

places.name: Parque do Povo (People's Park)
places.address: Av. Henrique Chamma, 420 - Pinheiros, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A modern and well-maintained park with sports courts, playgrounds, and a large lawn for picnics and relaxation.

places.name: São Paulo Museum of Art (MASP)
places.address: Av. Paulista, 1578 - Bela Vista, São Paulo - SP
places.description: One of the most important museums in Latin America, with an impressive collection of European and Brazilian art.

places.name: Pinacoteca do Estado de São Paulo
places.address: Praça da Luz, 2 - Luz, São Paulo - SP
places.description: Housed in a beautiful historic building, it holds one of the most important collections of Brazilian art since the 19th century.

places.name: Museum of Image and Sound (MIS)
places.address: Avenida Europa, 158 - Jardim Europa, São Paulo - SP
places.description: A dynamic cultural center that explores art through photography, cinema, video, and music, with innovative exhibitions.

places.name: Catavento Museum
places.address: Av. Mercúrio, s/n - Parque Dom Pedro II, Brás, São Paulo - SP
places.description: An interactive science and technology museum, ideal for curious children and adults, divided into Universe, Life, Ingenuity, and Society.
